name: Ope Ope no Mi
description: The Ope Ope no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create a spherical space or 'room' where they can manipulate the orientation, movements, and physical configuration of objects and people.
abilities: Immortality Surgery (at the cost of the user's life)
history: This fruit is currently used by Trafalgar D. Water Law, a member of the Worst Generation.
